summary: Did you know that GAO saved a record $214.7 billion for taxpayers in FY 2019? That's a return of about $338 for every dollar of our budget. We did it by recommending such things as preventing payment errors, improving the efficiency and effectiveness of federal programs, and preventing fraud. We also identified 1,418 other benefits—things that improve programs and operations but can't be measured in...
title: Performance and Accountability Report Fiscal Year 2019
